editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Dryer, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator, Washer
editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: This gorgeous like-new home sits on a large lot and features an open concept with hardwood floors, upgraded gourmet kitchen complete with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, expansive deck off the kitchen/family room perfect for entertaining, built-in surround sound in family room with deck speakers tied in, CAT-5 wired, Trex decking on charming front porch, large backyard with a bonus Multi- Sport Court and spacious 10' x10' shed, finished walk-out basement with Rec room and den plus full bathroom, stunning master suite with tray ceilings, large secondary bedrooms, plus additional storage throughout the home. Please call us today for a private tour.
response.whatOwnerLoves:
Neighbors, community, location, close to public transportation (Metro, ART buses), walk to grocery stores, shops, restaurants, parks and the library!
Walking distance to: Westover Beer Garden, the new Italian Store in Westover, Harris Teeter, Starbucks, Pie-Tanza, Baskin Robbins, District Taco
